attributes.action: Ask the media to stop using the term Islamic State in news reports.
attributes.background: Muslims are angered by the fact that this group has apparently hijacked the word 'Islamic' in their title. There is nothing Islamic about their actions. Describing them as Islamic taints Islam and gives the terrorists a gravitas in the news that they do not deserve.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the media, not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament.
